Vidiyathu Neenda En Eravil kanavai Tholaithu Thedi Alaintha Enaku Vidiyalai Puthu Kanavai Kidaitha Parisu Nee En Uyiril Un Jeevan Erukum Varai Unakaga kathirupen
Kadarkarai Manalil Nam Natpai Ezhuthi Vaithen Alai Vanthu Adithu Sella Villai Padithu Sentrathu Unmaiyana Natpu Entru

Nan Vaanamaga Erunthen Nee Nilavaga Thonrinaai Nam Natpu Natchathiramaga Thonriyathu Athai rasithu Kondiruntha Anaivarum Athu Thidirentru Marainthu Vittathena Nenaitharkal Unmaiyil athu Maraiya Villai Yenentral Neeyum Naanum Than Ingu Nanbarkalaga Erukirome
En nadpu en mochai veda perithu Athu epothum ennai ninakavaikum Entha pomiyil nadpa perithu Natpu iruthal ethayam sathikalam Nan en nadpai unmayaka nesikiran En uyir mochu varai entrum epavum
Nanbargal enbathu
kangalil eppodum karu vizhiyai, idhayatil epodum thudi thudipai, nan nadakaiyil ennodu nizhalai, sila samayam en padhach chuvadugalai irupaval en thozhi!
Nee Ennai Nesikave Yosikiraai Naan Unnai Nesippathaiye Swasikiren
kalangal kandandhu pogum nerathil nan kaneerodu thirumbi parkiren! Nam pazhagiya natkal meendum varuma endru
Un Anumathi Illamal Unnai Thoduven Un Kaneerai Thudaika Mattum
Uthadugal Solgirathu Unnidam Pesum Pozhuthu Nalam Entru Aanaal Kangal Solgirathu Unnai Kaanaatha Naatkal Naragam Entru
Nan uyirodu iruupathu ellarukum theriyum aanal en uyir unnodu iruppathu yarukum theriyathu unnai thavira
Avalai Kathalikum Pothu Nenaithen Avalukaga Ethai Vendumanalum Elakalam Entru Aanal Appothu Theriyavillai Aval Santhosathirkaga Avalaiye Elanthuviduven Entru
Nan paartha muthal theivam amma

Enathu kulanthai peruvathil oontru kolaai irunthapothum virumpum bommaiyil car thuppakiyai muthalidamakiyapothum cycle ai vaganamaki oorai theriya vaithapothum valarntha paruvathil ennai thavirthu ammavidam visaritha pothum en thirumanathai en viruppapadiye vittapothum puriavillai enaku en vazhvin villano ena nenaithathu thavaru ena unarnthen en magan avatharitha naalantru
Pirapin paalile ethirpin sakthiyai kodutha unnai eppadi ethirpen amma en vazhvil
Pirapurupai Kilithu Uthira Mulaam Poosi Pathu Thingalile Jeevan Velivara Ayyo Amma Entru Vethanaiyal Thudithu Kadavulidam Seyaiyum Emanidam Thannaiyum Adagu Vaitha Kan Kanda Theivam Aaththaa
Amma en pinchu kikali pidithu nadaga kadru koduthai annal nano un nadai thalarumpothu odivideenai amma anthanal thano kallarai kuda sumaka marukirathu.. minmayanam ennai alaikirathu
Theriyatha kaatrum puriyatha kavithaium sollatha kadhalum kalaiyatha kanavum endrumea azhaguthan
Oru nodi thunichal erunthal iranthu vidalam., ovvoru nodiyum thunichal erunthal jeyiethu vidalam..
Vendra piragu kidaikkum paarattai vida veezhntha udan kidaikkum ookkamea siranthathu
Marupiravi erunthal seruppaga pirakka vendum en amma kaalil mithipada alla ennai sumantha avalai oru murai nan sumappatharkaga
Nee thedi sendralum vilagi selvathu mattravargal.. nee vilagi sendralum unnai thedi varuvathu pettravargal...
Pothu nalathilum suyanalathai kaatum silarai pola ellamal.. suyanalathilum sirithu pothunalathai paarpaval neethanea amma
Ennai suvasikka vaitha avalukaga nan vasitha muthal kavithai amma..
Amma entrazhaikkatha uyirillaiyea.. en annaikku nigarana enai ellaiyea.. unnai pol oru azhagana sontham ellaiyea.. unakku enaiyana oru sugamana pantham ellaiyea..

Entha thesaiyelum un mugamea ennai aravanaithida paarthiduthea annai unthan madi sainthu kidanthida nooru jenmam vanthu yeangugiren niththam niththam unthan anbai pettru vida eazhu jenmam enaku vendum enben..
Eazhu jenmangalil enaku nambikkai ellai eni oru jenmam erunthu uyierinamai piranthal unnai enthan magalakum paakkiyam mattum pothum
Kallil sethukkiya uruvathai vida ennai karuvil sumantha thayea siranthaval
En annaiyin kannil nan kattrathu anbu.. en thanthaiyin kannil nan kattrathu veeram.. en kannil en pettroar kandathu mariyathai
Thaalattu saththam kettu nanum urangida thayea enakku neeyum vendum.. anbu enum uyir thanthu uthiramenum palil thenenum anbai ootti paasam enum panthathai earpaduthinai
Nan oru kannaadi., ennai paarthu nee sirithal nanum sirippen nee azhuthal nanum azhuven aanal nee adithal nan adikka maaten udainthu poven athuthan natpu
En thookkam un kanavodu en payanam un nenaivodu en kavithaikal un karpanaiyodu un kanneer en kangalodu en natpu un idhayathodu..
Kadhal oru kanavu than sila perukku palikkum.. palaperukku valikkum.. aanal natpu mattum than eppothum jolikkum..
Ennai vida nalla nanbanai nee kandu pidithal ennai kadanthusel., nan unnai thadukka maaten.. aanal avan unnai vittu valagi sendral pinnal thirumbi par angea unakaga nan eruppen nalla nanbanai..
Parkka kangal vendum suvasikka idhayam vendum unnai pola natpu kidaikka innoru jenmam vendum
Uravumurai ellatha uravea natpu..
Adivanathai meeriya ulagin azhagu enbathu payangalatra erandu miga siriya idhayangalin natpil ullathu..
Kaathal enbathu kaiserthu pogum varai.. natpu enbathu uyir pirinthu pogum varai..
Pookal enbathu uthirum varai., iravu enbathu vidiyum varai., uravu enbathu pesum varai., pirivi enbathu enaium varai., natpu enbathu uyierulla varai..
Kaalangal maaralam kanavugal maaralam nenjangal maaralam nenaivugal maaralam nam natpu endrum maarathu..
Anbea.. un naidaiyum udaiyum mellidaiyum unarthavillai nee azhagu enbathai., un anbil unarthi selgirai nee than perazhagu enbathai..
Varaiyapadatha oviyathin vannangalai sitharikidantha nan azhagiya oviyamanathu avanin varugaiku pinbu than
Uyirmei ezhuththukkalal nirainthirukkum en kavithaikal mattum unakanathu ellai., athil kalanthirukkum en uyirum unakanathu than.
Unnai engum sumanthea selgiren.. koottai thavirthu vazha mudiyatha naththaiyinai pola
Kalaiyatha kanavukkul kavithaiyai nee vanthai., varainthu vaitha oviyam pol vagaiyai ennul idam kondai..
Kaalam sendralum kanavugal marainthalum kavithaikal azhinthalum en uyir pirinthalum kaatrodu thodarnthu varuven un anbukaga..
Un anbai unmaiyaga nesikka palaper erukkalam., aanal uyiraga suvasikka nan mattumea erupen..
Unaku Pidithavaridam Anbaga Iru unnai Piditavaridam Unmayaga iru
Natpai Vilaikku Vanga Mudiyathu Thakuthiyanavargalukku Ilavasamagavae Valankapadugirathu
Sandaiyittu Ianthu Nimidathil Yethum Nadakkathathu Po lUrimaiyudan Pesum Natpu Udanirnthal Valkai Sorgam Than
NatpuKadarkari Manalil Yeluthum Verum Yeluthalla Idhya Aalathil Kuthappadum Pachai
Sila Nanbargalidam Nam Yedukkum Athiga Urimai Avargalai Punpaduthum Alavukku Irukkamal Parthu Kolvathu Nalam
Unnai Unmaiyilaeyae Purinthu Kondirukkum Nanban Than Unnayae Uruvakukinran
Ungal Thavarai Niyayapaduthum Nanbanai VidavumSuttikatti Thiruthum Nanban Than Siranthavan
Thinam Thittum Matravargalin Varthaigalai Vida Thittamal Nagarum Nanbanin Mounam Kodiyathu
Yenakku Munnadi Nadanthu Sellathae Unnai Pinpatri Vara Nan Virumbavillai Yen Pinnadi Nadanthu Varathae Unakku Munnodiyaga Irukka Virumbavillai Yennudanae Nasdanthu Va Yen Nanbanaga
Aayiram Perai Nanbaraga Vaithiruppathu Unakku Perumaiyalla Aayiram Per Yethirukkum Pothu Unakkaga Avargalai Yethirkka Koodiya Nanban Oruvanai Vaithiruppathae Unakku Perumaiyagum
Nee Yennidam Pseiyathai Vida Yenakkaga Pesiyathil Than Unarnthen Namakkana Natpai
Neer Ottamal Athanodu Vazhum Thamaripola Un Arukil Ilamal Ninavado Mattum Vazhum Uyirthozhi
Urimai Solla Uravugal Ayieram Irunthaalum En Ullathai Purinthu Kola Natpaga Nee Mattum Pothum
Ennangal Enge Sendralum Ninaivugal Veru Idam Nenaithalum Nenja Nenaivaligalal Nenjai Niraithathu Un Natpu Thane
Natpu Ennum Thottathil Poothom Muthalnal Piriuv Ennum Kallariyil Malaranom Kadaisi Nal
Udhadugal Paesum Vaarthaigal Tharum Valiyai Marakka Seiyum Manam Virumbiyavargalin Mounam
Natpu Enbathu Then Koodu Kattuvathu Perumpaadu Pirivu Enbathu Koodathu Pirinthaal En Manam Thaangathu
Palli Paruvathil Pirikira Velaiyil Kangalil Valikintra Kanneer Thuli En Nanbanin Idhayam
Vazhkaiyil Vazhi Yerpaduthi kodutha Natpe Valiyai Undakathu Entra Unmaiyin Unarvupoorvamana Satchi Kaalathal Pirikapatta Natpu
Nillavupol Ne Thooramaha Iruinthalum Natchatirangal Pole Unnai Sutriiruipen
Un Arugil Irukkum Nerangalil En Annaiyai Unnai Uranthen Karanam Aval Ennai Karuvil Sumanthal Nee Ennai Un Kannil Sumakkirai
Sugam Varumbodhu Adhai Nee Mattum Thangikkol Sogam Vandhal Mattum Solli Anuppu Un Sumaiyai Thaanga Thol Koduppen Un Tholi Endra Urimaiyodu
Sippikul Irupadhu Muthu Poovukul Irupadhu Then Imaikul Irupadhu Vizhi Ennul Irupadhu Nee Un Kadhal
Manathai Kodukum Kathallikaha Uyirai Kodupathai Vida Uyirai Kodukum Nanbanukaha Unmayana Uravai Koduthupar Valkai Un Vasappadum
Manathukku Pidithavargalidam Manam Vitu Pesinal Marana Vali Kooda Maranthu Pogum
Suyanalamana Nanbanudan Natpai Erupathai Vida Nanbane Ellamal Erupathu Evvalavo Mel
En Thayin Karuvil Muthalil Valarum Uruppu Idhayam Antha Idhayathil Valaruvathu Nam Natpu
Natpai Vida Aazhamanathu Intha Ulagathil Veru Ethuvum Erukathu

Yenrenrum Unnai Ninaithirupaen Yeravathu Oru Nal Marnthirupaen Antru Nan Iranthirupaen
Siragugal Illai Yennidam Unnai Thedi VaraAanal Idhayam IrukkirathuYenrum Unnai Ninaithida
Nilvukkum Oru Nal Vidumurai UnduAanal Un Ninaivukku Yenrum Vidumurai IllaiEn Idhaiyathil irunthu
Varthaikalal Kayappaduthuvai Parvaigalal Marunthiduvai Maruthirku Aasaipattu Kayapattu kondae Irukkinraen Naan
Naatgal Vegamai NagarkinrathuAanal Nan Appadiyae Than NirkinraenNee Yennai Vittu Senra Idathil
Yarudan Vala Mudiyumo Avargalai Nesippathai Vida Yar Illamal Vala Mudiyatho Aavargalai Athigamaga Nesiyungal
Nee Rojavaga IrunthalNan Mullaga IruppeanUnnai Kayappadutha AllaUnnai Yarum Kayappaduthamal Irukka
Mudivae Illatha pathaiyil Payanam Seikiraen Mudivil Nee Iruppai Yenra Nambikaiyil
Imaikkum Yen Kangal Unnai Parkkamal Irukkalam Aanal Thudikkum Yen Idhayam Unnai Yepothum Marappathillai
Oorellam Uranki Poi KidakkinrathuThoongamal yen Manam Thoonga Vidamal Un Mugam
Nee Kan Simittum Pothu Than YenakkuUyir Iruppathu Therinthathu
Megam Mothi Vanam KayapattathillaiParavai Mothi Parai NagaruvathillaiThenral Mothi Vinnilavu VeelvathillaiAanal Un Vizigal MothiyathilVeelnthu Vittanae Nan
Nee Yenarukil Illai Yenbathu Yevalavvu Unmaiyo Avvalavvu Unmai Nee Enakkul Irukkinrai Yenbathu
Unnai Marappatharku Nee Onrum Manalil Varayappatta Ooviyam Alla
Yen Mel Por Thoduppathai Niruthi Vidu!Vendumenral Yennai kathal Siraiyil Aayul Kaithi Aakiividu
Kathal Karuppu Kaviyin Arumbu Idhayam Irumbu Karaiyatha Karumbu
Kavi Enum Sollil Malarntha Muga Parukkal Nenjin Kathal Enben
Kathal Vanthal Veeranum Kulanthai Pol Vazha Aasaipaduvan Aval Madiyil
Aaskar Viruthum Kidaithathu Kathal Kavigaluku Aval Kangalin Parvaiyil
Mayielum Thorkum Aval Imai Azhagil Thogaiku Kan Simitta Theriyathu Entru

Puriyatha Kelviku Vidaiyilla Vidukathaigal Theriyatha Pathaiku Thadaiyilla Payanangal Kathalai Puriyum Manam Yaridamum Illai Appadi Irunthal Un Kathal Thotral Unnai Eentra Ulagam Vazhnthu Parthu Azhuvum
Kathal Entra Thesathil Kavithai Enum Sol Agarathiku Eppothum Oivu Kidaiyathu
Valum Kalam Vasantham UnnoduValntha Pinbu Valkai UnnoduEntha Neram Privu VanthathoKondu Sellum Maranam AntroNerin Thulikal Nenaikum AntroNe Arivai Valkai Entru...
Kangalin Imai Oram Padintha Thuli Kanneerai Kavi Enum Kaikuttaiyal Niththam Niththam Thudaikiren
Kangal Kavithai Ezhuthiyathu Kanatha Pothu Un Kanneeral Kanda Pothu En Kanneeral
Kangalil Thoovum Kathal Mazhai Mannil Sarugai Uthirnthathu Kathal Nenjil Mullai Kuthuthu
Pala Kathal Inaiyum Varai Po Sollum Sila Kathal Sagum Varai Swasamai Meiyagum
Kathal Entra Vinthaikul Aayieram Kayangal Marunthu Poda Irandu Maruththuvangal Ontru Madi Thookam Erandu Mathu Mayakam
Pala Murai Vikkal Eduthum Orumurai Kooda Thanneer Kudikavilai Nenaipathu Neeyaga Irundal Needikkattum Sila Nimidam Endru....
Nanum Eppothuthan nadai Palakukiren Kulanthai pol Kathalil Un ninaivukalal
Ore Uyir.. Ore Murai Tha Izhapen...! Athai Unakaka Than Izhapen...!!!
Oru Kirukanai Pol Alaikiren. Thallada Vaikum Un Varugaiyin Tharunathil
Un Madiyil Thalai Saithth Nan Thungi Pogum Velaiyil Un Kaikal Yen Thalaiyai Varuda Varuda Kathali Yendra Nilai Uyarnthu Nan Un Kulanthai Aagiren Nee Yen Annai Aagirai
En Idhayam Thudipathai Ketka Vendu .. Un Meedhu Saindhu Kolava

Unmaiyana Kadhal Enbathu Valkaiyel Oru Tharunathil Negal Kadhalil Seramudiyatha Nerathil Kadhalanai Marathalum Kadhalai Marakathirgal ,En Endral Kadhalargal Thavaraga Irukalam Anal Kadhal Thavaragathu
Unnai ulaga alagi yenru Sola maten Yen yendral Athu sila kalam than.... But Ullaga athisyam yendru Solven Yen yentral Athisam yepavum Aliyathu
Anbu Endra Varthiku Aayiram Artham Irupinum Naan Kanda Mei Artham Nedhan
Kalamellam Unnodu Vala Thudikun En Ithayathai Nee Purindhugollavillai Kalam Unaku Unarthum En Kathalai Nee Illai Enru Ponalum Unakaha Nan Valven
Yennai Verutha Avalaiyae Maraka Mudiyatha Pothu Nan Virumbiya Avalai Yennal Eapadi Maraka Mudiyum

Alagiya Paalaivanathin Osai Nee Arugil Irunthum Innum Un Mounam Yennai Maraimugammai Thaakiya Aayutham Pondrathu... Thaamatham Yeeno Yen Iniya Kaathalane... Un Kaathalai Yennidam Samarpanam Koduthidu Miga Miga Viraivil.... Unthan Yennaval
Yen Siripil Kooda Unn Elaphin Sayal Therikiratham Solpavarkaluku Theriyuma? Yen Siripae Nee Than Yentru
Kan Mudi Nan Kanum Kanavu Ni Yental Vidiyatha Eravukal Pothum Nan Valven
Marathil Irupathu Semparuthi En Manathil Irupathtu Ne Oruthi
Eththanai Valigal Vanthalum - Penne Unnai Parkum Pothu Athhanai Valigalum Enakkukku Enbamaga Marukirathu
Naan Swasikkum Katril Un Moochu Kalandhu Irundhal En Uyir Moochu Nirkum Varai Unnai Nesikkum Naan Akkatrinai Swasika Mattume Seyven
Yennai Santhosa Paduthi Sirika Vaithathum Nee Than. Yennai Vittu Thoorum Sentru Aala Vaithathum Nee Than.. Intru Unnai Ninaithu Aaluthu Sirikirean Anbinal Paithiyamagi
Manasil Kayangal Yerpaduthiya Valiyai Vida Un Siripal Yerpaduthiya Vali Valikirathu Ippothu Alukiren Thaniyaga
Kadhalil Varum Kalavarainkalai Eluthal Eluthinean Aathu Kavithaiyaga Katchiyalikirathu.
Athigam aazham illai... Irunthaalum vizhunthuvitten... Un kannakkuzhiyile...

Kaalam Muzhudhum Serndhirupen, Un Nizhalaga Nee Imai Moodum Varai Kaathirupen Un Kangalaga Nee Swasikum Katril Kalanthirupen Oru Anuvaga Nee Uranginaalum Vizhithirupen Un Kanavaga Nee Ennai Neesikum Varai Ninrirupen Un Idhayamaga Un Vaasathudan Inainthu Irupen Oru Malaraga Nee Ennai Veruthalum Vaazhnthuirupen Oru Pinamaga..Kallaraiyil
Unakkum Enakkum Ulla Uravu Athu Uyir Ulla Varai Varum Bantham Neyum Nanum Nadakkum Pothu Nilal Varum Nam Iruvarai Sumanthu
Poothurukum Malargalai Kooda Parikka Manamillai... Karanam Pirivin Vali Enakum Theriyum
Kavithai Varuvathu Eppadi Endru Ketten Ennai Kadhalithu Paar Kavithai Varum Endru Sonnavan... Kaneer Varum Endru Solla Maranthu Vittan
Avan Enaku Illai Endru Uruthiyaga Therindha Piragum Uyirodu Irukiren Avanukkaga Alla Avanodu Vaazhntha Andha Ninaivukalugaka
Ovvoru Nalum Urugukirathu En Ullam Avanudan Iruntha Nerangalai Nenaithu
Pirinthu Sentra Unnitam Nan Purinthu Konden Ontru Mattum Ithuthan Kadhal Vali Endru
Kathal Elloridamum Than Irukrathu Silaruku Kavithaiyai! Silaruku Kanneerai
Arugil Varugaiyil Tholaivil Selvathum Tholaivil Nirkaiyil Arugil Varuvathumana Un Kadhalai Purindhu Kolvathu Kanithathai Vida Kadinam Enakku
Unakana En Kavithaiyai Ooray Rasikirathu Oru Vari Kooda Nee Padipathillai Uyiray Valikirathu

Nilavae Vinnirangi Vanthayo Immanilengum Vanna Malargalin Thoralgal Valiyengum Malar Idhalgalin Muthangal Yengae Senru Marainthai Yen Kangal Kana Thudikirathae Imaigal Moodavum Marukirathae Un Mugathai Kati Vidu Or Punagaiyudan Kathalai Solli Vidu Athu Onrae Pothum Ivvulagai Un Kaladiyil Kidathiduvaen En Uyiraiyae Unagai Koduthiduven
Pennae Nee Pesum Ovooru Varthaiyum Yen Idhyathai Kuthi Kzhikirathae Nee Yenna Mutgalin Sonthakariya Am Maranthuvitten Rojavuku Mutgal Sontham Thanae
Intha Isaiyin Sathathirku Munbu Isai Gnaniyin Isaiyum Thotrupokum
Avalin Punnagai Thedum Payanam Mudiyathu Unnai Kanum Varai Thudikum Idhayam Nirkathu Un Madiyil Sayum Varai
Kagathidam Katrukondaen Thiruduvathu Eppadiyenru Aanal Indru Varai Thirudamudiyavillai Ennavalin Idhayathai
Nadantha Paathangal Kadanthu Sendralum Un Kaal Adi Thadangal Endrum Madiyatha Suvadaai En Manathil
Yezhu Varna Oviyame Unnai Varaintha Oviyan Yaar Yezhu Varna Silaiye Unnai Sithaitha Sirpi Yaar Un Azhagai Kandu Viyanthidumo Ennudaiya Yezham Arivu
Veyil Kuda Ithamaha Irukirathu Ne En Arugil Nirkumbothu
Unnai Ninaikaiyil Sindhugindra Kanneer Kanamanathu Eanenil Athil Karainthirupathu Nan

Neeyum Naanum Ambikapathi Amaravathiyaagi Sarithira Pakkangalai Nirapa Vendam Laila Majnu Vaagi Kaaviya Pakkangalil Idam Pera Vendam, Nee En Pakkamum Nan Un Pakkamum Agi, Naam Oru Sarithira Kaaviyangalai Padaippom
Paarthu Nadanthu Pongal Aval Paarvai Mothi Saalaiyengum Sinthikidakkirathu En Nenjam
Pidithirukirathu Jannalora Irukai Ne Vittu Chellum Moochukatrai Etti Pidika Vasathiyai Irukirathu
Nan Unnai Maraka Vendum Endru Ninaikum Pothuellm Unai Than Ninaikeren Endru Maranthu Vidathe
Kanavil Mattume Nee Varuvaai Endru Therintha Vidiyal Endra Ondru Illamale Irukkalam
Naan Unakkaaga Ennudaiya Santhosathai Thiyagam Seithane Aanaal Nee Unnudaiya Santhosathuku Ennaiye Thiyagam Seithaai
Un Uthattel Milirum Punnagaikku En Uthadugalai Parisakki Adhil Uer Tharikkum Dharunam Eppoluthu
Pookal Uthirum Pothu Oru Muraithan Maranam Nee Ennai Vidu Piriyum Ovvoru Nodiyum Maranam
Kayam Illamal Kanavugal Kaanalam Aanal Vali Illamal Vetrigal Kaana Mudiyadhu
Kanavugalai Sumanthu Sentra En Kaagitha Kappal Kanneeril Mozhgi Kallarai Geetham Padugirathu
